name: Everflowing Crystal Cloak
effect:
:instant: Discard 3 cards to gain 2 :valuables:.

— OR —

:instant: Gain 1 :valuables:.
flavor_text: Taking shelter from a storm in a small cave, you notice a small patch of crystal in one corner. Curious, you discover that the patch is really a cloak, and when you break a piece off it mysteriously grows back. You decide to take the cloak with you.
